table.name: its4you_cashflow4you
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_cashflow4you` ( `cashflow4youid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `cashflow4youname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cashflow4you_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `cashflow4you_paymethod` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentamount` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `relationid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `transactionid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `relation_no` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `due_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `currency_id` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `payamount_main` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `cashflow4you_paytype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cashflow4you_category` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `relatedto` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `cashflow4you_cash` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `accountingdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `vat_amount` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `total_without_vat` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `tax_expense` varchar(3) DEFAULT '0', `cashflow4you_subcategory` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cashflow4you_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cashflow4you_associated_no` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `contactid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `relations` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `conversion_rate` decimal(10,3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1.000', PRIMARY KEY (`cashflow4youid`), KEY `relationid` (`relationid`), KEY `relation_no` (`relation_no`), KEY `currency_id` (`currency_id`), KEY `cashflow4you_paytype` (`cashflow4you_paytype`), KEY `cashflow4you_category` (`cashflow4you_category`), KEY `relatedto` (`relatedto`), KEY `cashflow4you_subcategory` (`cashflow4you_subcategory`), KEY `cashflow4you_status` (`cashflow4you_status`), KEY `cashflow4you_associated_no` (`cashflow4you_associated_no`), KEY `cashflow4you_no` (`cashflow4you_no`), KEY `contactid` (`contactid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_cashflow4youcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_cashflow4youcf` ( `cashflow4youid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cashflow4youid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_cashflow4you_associatedto
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_cashflow4you_associatedto` ( `cashflow4youid` int(19) NOT NULL, `cashflow4you_associated_id` int(19) NOT NULL, `partial_amount` decimal(25,3) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_cashflow4you_license
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_cashflow4you_license` ( `version_type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `license_key` varchar(255) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `version_type` (`version_type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB

table.name: its4you_cashflow4you_version
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `its4you_cashflow4you_version` ( `version` varchar(30) NOT NULL, `license` varchar(255) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY `version` (`version`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB
